page.title: 15Entertainment (cont)
page.content: The recreation ground covers a large area and is used by village football and cricket teams. There are two tennis courts for the use of villagers many of whom belong to the thriving tennis club. A children's play area with swings, seesaw, climbing apparatus and a slide near the tennis courts. Every Sunday a meeting of the athletics club is held at the infants school field. It's open to anyone interested. The joining fee is '1.00 and 20 pence per week. People from the village run it and it covers all kinds of sport activities.
